i am no good with auto restarters, but if its lag you are trying to reduce.. check this out

programming, irc, cars

pretty straight forward…(it makes it so it doesnt keep saying on your cmd prompt…

blah blah blah has loaded
blah blah blah has loaded
blah blah blah has loaded
every 2 seconds… which reduces shit load of lag

There is no lag in the server, its for rebooting every 30 min to get rid of any nulls while im not around[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 11:42:18 pm[/size][hr]i cant find any tuts or anything off google that helps

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @danielknuckles danielknuckles
item.description:
@danielknuckles wrote:

Could somebody please tell me how to work this so it reboots my server every 30 min? it would be greatly appreciated

[code]// This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 99999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
